titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on copoly(dimethyl carbonate/1,6-hexanediol).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on copoly(dimethyl carbonate/1,6-hexanediol).
